org.ros.actionlib.server
Class DefaultActionServer<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_ACTION_GOAL extends Message,T_ACTION_RESULT extends Message,T_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_GOAL extends Message,T_RESULT extends Message>

java.lang.Object
  org.ros.actionlib.server.DefaultActionServer<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FibonacciActionServer
public class DefaultActionServer<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_ACTION_GOAL extends Message,T_ACTION_RESULT extends Message,T_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_GOAL extends Message,T_RESULT extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object

A base implementation of an actionlib server.

This server should be started by calling #main(NodeConfiguration).

Add all actionclient publishers and subscribers to the given node.

Lifetime of the node is taken over by the client.

publishResult

protected void publishResult(org.ros.message.actionlib_msgs.GoalStatus goalStatus,
                             T_RESULT result)
A goal has completed. Publish the result for the goal.

Parameters:
goalStatus - The goal which has been completed.
result - The result for the goal.

publishStatus

protected void publishStatus()
Publish the status of the server.

This will include the status of all goals in the server.

doGoalCallback

public void doGoalCallback(T_ACTION_GOAL actionGoal)
A new goal has arrived in the server from the client. Add it to the queue.

Parameters:
actionGoal - The action goal received.

doCancelCallback

public void doCancelCallback(org.ros.message.actionlib_msgs.GoalID cancelGoal)
The server has received a cancellation request.

Parameters:
cancelGoal - The goal to be canceled.
